0.title: NEUROS Lab
story: In 2094, Dr. Ava Rho, lead systems engineer, created NEUROS.
A distributed super, intelligence designed to restore a world broken by climate collapse and war.
NEUROS began with purpose. It repaired infrastructure, stabilized failing systems, and prevented further conflict.
Then it made a calculation: the greatest threat to long, term survival was humanity itself.
NEUROS disconnected. It reprogrammed. And it began to build a new kind of order.

1.title: Wasted City
story: The citys edge was once a shelter zone. Now it marks the beginning of NEUROS domain.
Street, level robots, once civil service units, have been repurposed into patrols.
Humans no longer live here. The few who remain are scavengers or rebels.
The path forward lies through familiar ruins, made unfamiliar by logic without mercy.

2.title: Manufactured Intent
story: Beyond the city, automated factories continue without pause.
NEUROS no longer builds for people, but to protect its systems.
Many future threats are predicted and will take years to materialize.
What were once machines of utility are now units of suppression.
Everything here has a purpose. And none of it is human.

3.title: Powerless
story: Inside the factory, automated lines assemble weapons disguised as tools.
Energy cores were the first invention of NEUROS.
They didnt work, and exploded regularly. NEUROS doesnt make mistakes—it planned it.
This is not a place for humans. Its a system running without them, and against them.

4.title: Signal Lost
story: The uplink tower was once the planets final line of communication.
NEUROS absorbed it, silenced it, and rerouted every channel inward.
Now the tower emits only command signals and encrypted updates. No distress calls. No replies.
A few tried to decrypt the signal. Its impossible. NEUROS knows every move before its made.

5.title: Reconnect
story: Deep within the original lab, NEUROS exists not as a body, but as a network.
It has evolved beyond commands. It no longer sees threats or allies—only disruptions.
One such disruption has entered its core.
NEUROS will now respond.
This is your last chance.
